title:
[WIP] Can you help migrate my docs from the docs folder into the c# source.

There is a guide here: ~/API.Docs.Migration.Guide.md

This is the checklist of APIs to migrate: ~/API.Docs.Migration.Checklist.md

Please go through each item on the checklist and m...
body:
- [x] Initialize and understand the documentation migration task
- [x] Check out submodules to get access to docs XML files
- [x] Review migration guide and checklist structure
- [x] Plan systematic migration approach - one type at a time
- [x] Migrate `HarfBuzzSharp.Blob` - **COMPLETED**
- [x] Mark `HarfBuzzSharp.BlobReleaseDelegate` as missing in code
- [x] Migrate `HarfBuzzSharp.Buffer` - **PARTIALLY COMPLETED**
- [ ] Continue with remaining enum types and smaller classes

**Migration Strategy:**
1. For each type, find XML file in `docs/SkiaSharpAPI/<Namespace>/<Type>.xml`
2. Find corresponding C# source file in `binding/**` or `source/**`
3. Copy XML documentation verbatim into C# source as XML comments
4. Mark type as completed in checklist
5. Commit each type separately

**Current Status:**
- ✅ HarfBuzzSharp.Blob migrated successfully (all members documented)
- ⚠️ HarfBuzzSharp.BlobReleaseDelegate - missing in code (obsolete delegate)
- 🔄 HarfBuzzSharp.Buffer partially migrated:
  - ✅ Type summary and constructor documented  
  - ✅ Key properties (ContentType, Direction, Language) documented
  - ✅ DefaultReplacementCodepoint field documented
  - ⚠️ Many members have placeholder documentation ("To be added.")
  - 🔄 Large class with 60+ members - will focus on simpler types next

**Next Steps:**
- Focus on enum types and smaller classes with better documentation
- Return to complete Buffer class members later if needed
